channel.title: Feeding random pitches into a sel_fb_16?
channel.description:
Greetings,
Just received my Axoloti and am completely immersed. Currently writing material for a series of EPs I've committed to this year and am excited for Axotoli to be all over each record.
While I attempt to wrap my head around all this thing can do, I figured I'd start out with a problem that I have, must have been solved, and haven't had any luck via Google:
Can you feed a sel fb 16 (or any other sel device) with random pitches? Ideally, to be used in a more generative context.
Appreciate any help and really love this thing!!

item.title: Feeding random pitches into a sel_fb_16?
item.dc:creator: @Blindsmyth Simon
item.description:
@Blindsmyth wrote:

I think you might wanna try this one out:

Subpatch: 16 step sequencer Patching
Hi everyone! Today i patched a quite simple 16-step sequencer. It's almost ready to use (just connect to a few things and you're ready to go!) and has some really neat features: sequencer16.axs (19.3 KB) You can see it in action in this simple patch: Sequencer demo.axp (16.9 KB) , you simply have to put both files in the same folder. [image] BASIC SETUP RULES - READ THIS -Create 16 dial objects and connect them to the respective blue inlets (value 1-..-16), you'll need these to providâ€¦

It has Pitch inlets for each step. With some sample and hold you could probably randomize that.

Read full topic
item.source: Feeding random pitches into a sel_fb_16?

item.title: Feeding random pitches into a sel_fb_16?
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

You could fill a table with random values at startup. Then read the values from the table and feed them into the pitch inlet of an oscillator when the patch is running.

This topic may be useful to get started:

Storing values/data in Axoloti, and ability to recall it

well maybe its the indexer - it works fine (i guess) with a simple string. I can save and load the table file. [image]

Read full topic
item.source: Feeding random pitches into a sel_fb_16?
